channel.title: Project-Azure [OLDSCHOOL] [459]
channel.description:
[b]Please note this is not a remake [/b] [center][size=14pt][b]Teleportation[/b][/size] [B]Jewellery[/B] [QUOTE][IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101102040354/runescape/images/4/47/Dragonstone_ammy.png[/img] [I][B]Amulet of Glory(4)[/B][/I] [*]Draynor Village [*]Al Kharid [*]Karamja [*]Edgeville[/QUOTE] [QUOTE][IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110810005732/runescape/images/e/ed/Sapphire_necklace.png[/img] [I][B]Games Necklace(8)[/B][/I] [*]Burthorpe [*]Tzhaar [*]Lletya[/QUOTE] [QUOTE][IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111120174621/runescape/images/5/5d/Emerald_ring.png[/img] [I][B]Ring Of Dueling(8)[/B][/I] [*]Duel Arena [*]Barrows [*]Castle Wars[/QUOTE] [B]Non-Play Character[/B] [QUOTE][IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110809223728/runescape/images/thumb/4/4b/Mord_Gunnars.png/120px-Mord_Gunnars.png[/img] [I][B]Sailor[/B][/I] [*]Dagannoths [*]Karamja [*]Brimhaven [*]Fishing Colony][/QUOTE] [QUOTE][IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111130135831/runescape/images/thumb/b/b6/Watchtower_Wizard.png/150px-Watchtower_Wizard.png[/img] [I][B]Watchtower Wizard[/B][/I] [*]Fishing Colony [*]Training [*]Slayer Tower [*]Market[/QUOTE] [QUOTE][IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120829060647/runescape/images/thumb/7/71/Jethick.png/140px-Jethick.png[/img] [I][B]Jethick[/B][/I] [*]Market[/QUOTE] [QUOTE][IMG]http://puu.sh/1HWCQ[/img] [B][I]Dark Mage[/I][/B] [*]Varrock Wild [*]East Dragons [*]Hills [*]Mage Bank[/QUOTE] Features
Working woodcutting Amazing oldschool feel Great economy Great Starter base Very straightforward server Working firemaking Working Cooking Working Woodcutting with Stumps Working Runecrafting Working Agility And many more skills No items over 369 Relive that oldschool feeling Working Purple Sweets ! Home teleport no longer requires 1 law rune other teleports do Full 63 waves jad Tz kih now drains prayer Starter pack edited removed 250k and d scimitar D mace bug fixed Dagannoth kings added working great ! Home moved back to Draynor Recipe for disaster soon to be added Elemental workshop soon to be added Dagannoths require a team of 2-3 players Many more updates soon to come ! Cooks Assistant Quest added will post vid soon ! Sailing has been added will post a vid soon ! Creating SplitBark Added ! 100% credits to vox Cracking Wallsafes Weapon Sounds Added Music Added Item animations added ! Clue Scrolls Four fully functional quests added !
Many colours to choose from ! [img]http://puu.sh/YJgo[/img] Bet with friends using mithril seeds ! [img]http://puu.sh/YJhT[/img] 420 Interfaces [img]http://puu.sh/YJQx[/img] Working crafting [img]http://puu.sh/YJrT[/img] Four fully working quests and all of them unique ! [img]http://puu.sh/YJsf[/img] Working Firemaking [img]http://puu.sh/YJxk[/img] Working Woodcutting [img]http://puu.sh/YJAG[/img] Fletching (u) [img]http://puu.sh/YJBU[/img] Stringing Bows [img]http://puu.sh/YJFe[/img] Pick Flax [img]http://puu.sh/YJHO[/img] Alot of bossing [img]http://puu.sh/1HVJz[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1HWbM[/img] [/center]

item.title: Project-Azure [OLDSCHOOL] [459]
item.dc:creator: @rooneyscape rooneyscape
item.description:
@rooneyscape wrote:

The name has been changed to Project-Azure, the reason for this change is because the name RooneyScape seemed a bit childish and everyone amongst the team has chosen Project Azure as a nice change.

Read full topic

Features

Working woodcutting Amazing oldschool feel Great economy Great Starter base Very straightforward server Working firemaking Working Cooking Working Woodcutting with Stumps Working Runecrafting Working Agility And many more skills No items over 369 Relive that oldschool feeling Working Purple Sweets ! Home teleport no longer requires 1 law rune other teleports do Full 63 waves jad Tz kih now drains prayer Starter pack edited removed 250k and d scimitar D mace bug fixed Dagannoth kings added working great ! Home moved back to Draynor Recipe for disaster soon to be added Elemental workshop soon to be added Dagannoths require a team of 2-3 players Many more updates soon to come ! Cooks Assistant Quest added will post vid soon ! Sailing has been added will post a vid soon ! Creating SplitBark Added ! 100% credits to vox Cracking Wallsafes Weapon Sounds Added Music Added Item animations added ! Clue Scrolls Four fully functional quests added !

Many colours to choose from !

Bet with friends using mithril seeds !

420 Interfaces

Working crafting

Four fully working quests and all of them unique !
